website_summaries.verdict: It's similar to the Wabi Baby but is a bit less reliable.
pros: Effectively uses steam to sterilize up to 6 bottles at once
Can simultaneously sterilize bottle parts and pacifiers in the spacious accessory tray
cons: Bottles are a bit wet after the steaming cycle, requiring additional time on the "dry" setting

customer_reviews.title: ... cycle is fast but it takes some time to cool down everything
customer_reviews.text: The sterilization cycle is fast but it takes some time to cool down everything. It kinda takes up space in the kitchen but it's not as big as I first thought. 7 bottles and my breast pump fits there perfectly. i really liked in the beginning and was about to give to 5 stars ... But after 1 week the metal panel inside turned rusty and plastik turns brown. I through away box so I wasn't able to return or exchange ... I was using it for another 2 weeks and it's just was getting worse.
customer_reviews.author: alona

customer_reviews.title: Trust me, you will miss the DRY functionality
customer_reviews.text: Well, the product does what is advertised. However, it does not provide the best experience for new moms. The whole point of a sterilizer is to sterilize and keep the bottles clean, DRY and ready for the next feeding in the middle of the night. This item does not dry the bottles. Infact it dries them slower than placing them in a drying rack when they are inside the sterilizer due to the moisture build up. I found this product much better.  It gives you clean and dry bottles in an hour with single push of a button. Totally worth the extra 20 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Rajalakshmi Ramesh

customer_reviews.title: Great for larger bottles
customer_reviews.text: I have twins and we recently switched to the larger Dr. Brown's bottles. I was using the Medela microwave steam bags for sterilization. They work great but I can only sterilize 2 of the larger bottles at once in the bags. With 8 bottles a day and pump parts I was spending an hour+ running things through the microwave. Boiling wasn't much better. This sterilizer has cut my sterilization time down to 24 minutes! I can run a full days bottles and pump parts through in just 3 cycles. Really wishing I would have bought this a month ago when I returned to work because this essentially equals an extra 30 minutes of sleep for me!
customer_reviews.author: Casey M Sandow

customer_reviews.title: Great baby bottle sanitizer
customer_reviews.text: The sanitizer does its job perfectly. The only reason I’m giving it 4 stars is because it leaves residue/gooey liquid at the bottom of the sanitizer where the heating element is even if you pour the exact right amount of water into the sanitizer. I have to wipe out the residue/goo after every use. Otherwise it is a great product and saves me a lot of time when sanitizing baby bottles and bottle accessories.
customer_reviews.author: CAM

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I am a first time mom, so I bought this sterilizer because it was the same brand of bottle I had received. I am very disappointed with how wet it leaves the bottles! There is SO much water left behind, too! You only use 3oz of water in the machine.... and it is all still there when the sterilization process is finished. I fear that mold/mildew will be an issue if the machine is not dried out completely after each use, especially in hot weather seasons. I will be giving this away and hunting for a new brand/style.
customer_reviews.author: Regular customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time or money
customer_reviews.text: Overall was extremely disappointed in the product. I was really looking forward to not having to boil the bottles constantly however this sanitizer never seemed to get hot so I never felt comfortable with feeling like the bottles we actually clean. Not to mention the amount of water that was left on the bottles was ridiculous and would take FOREVER to dry. Ended up returning the item and purchased a bottle sanitizer/ dryer and couldn’t be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: Fits everything and super easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and fits so many things to sterilize. From all the Dr Browns products to pacifiers or anything you want to sterilize it fits. So much room. Very easy to use, just push button and it starts the cycle. It lasts about 12 mins to go thru all the stages. It is big so takes up room but prefer it over a microwaveable sterilizer.
customer_reviews.author: Myrabi

customer_reviews.title: Essential for Sterilizing!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t know how essential bottle sterilization was untile I asked my mom. Once I fidgeted out that it was a must I purchased this sterilizer to go with my bottles. This is one of the best investments I made! The sterilizer is a good price and well worth the money. I use this product everyday and I am thankful I don’t have to sterilize the old fashion way! Also- this machine is made to be compatible with othe brands aside from Dr Browns but if you have Dr.Brown bottles it’s really nice because it is tailored exactly for them.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Shibley

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed with this sterilizer
customer_reviews.text: I'm a bit disappointed with this product. For the price I paid for this sterilizer, I thought it would have done a better job than it does. It leaves the bottles very wet and wish there was a dryer feature on this model. I'm also a bit disappointed, the bottom part where the metal is, has started to discolor/rust after only 3 usages using distilled water. I wanted to return it, but I no longer have the box. I bought this since we have Dr. Brown bottles and needed something quickly. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: More of a lavish than essential purchase honestly
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly. I originally bought it thinking it wash a mini bottle washer (oops). Worked as the video demonstrated to sanitize after washing. As a 1st time mom I was too concerned to wash bottles in the dishwasher. So it was nice to have that extra step to ensure there was no left over bacteria from handwashing. But after he grew out of infant sleep all the time phase and into crawling mode, aint nobody got time for that so it was paid forward and donated to another expecting mother.
customer_reviews.author: Lynzie Marie

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Sterilizes as promised, it does leave everything dripping wet compared to other units that sterilize and dry until usage, but it is still nice to have sterilized bottles in just a few minutes. Easy to use, nothing complicated, just fill the included measuring cup with distilled water and add to the sterilizer. Holds 6 bottles, all the parts that come with the anti colic bottles, pacifiers and teething toys! It was a huge help with our little guy teething so early and keeping all of his chewies as clean and sterile as possible! Great product and well worth it!!! I see the product dropped in price by almost $20 since I purchased so it’s an even better deal now!!
customer_reviews.author: Witchyvibes

customer_reviews.title: Water water everywhere
customer_reviews.text: Large and easy to use, but how did they manage to design it so poorly? Surely they could have found a way for the condensation to not pour out the back when you open the lid? I’m constantly mopping up pools of water behind the sterilizer. It has good capacity, and of course fits Dr.Browns bottles well. But, it’s a mess and (as others have mentioned) even while using exclusively distilled water, the heating element and the area under the bottles gets gross. For the $60 price tag, I was hoping for something a bit more elegant.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper - PL

customer_reviews.title: How to remove the condensation after use
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I weren't big fans of this sterilizer because, as others have noted, it leaves condensation in the bottles. We found that if you take the bottles out of the sterilizer immediately after it is finished, shake the water out of the bottles over the sink, and let them dry upright with the tops of the bottles facing the ceiling, the bottles will dry without condensation. Hope this helps! Four stars because of this extra step, but otherwise a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... a dishwasher and were looking for something quick and easy to use to sanitize our babies bottles
customer_reviews.text: We do not have a dishwasher and were looking for something quick and easy to use to sanitize our babies bottles, pacifiers etc. this machine works great. Easy to use and can use for More then just dr. Browns bottles. We use it For medela pump parts as well.
customer_reviews.author: kathryn marshall

customer_reviews.title: Your guess is as good as mine
customer_reviews.text: This gets the bottles and parts wet with steam, but the sterilization is questionable. I have used purified water since the get go and hand wash everything before putting items in this, but always end up with spots on all the bottles. I clean the machine regularly, but the spots never go away. Where do the spots come from? Your guess is as good as mine. You are better off boiling the parts when you need to sterilize them and hand wash or dish wash any other time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great time saver
customer_reviews.text: This sterilizer is so helpful when washing my Dr. Brown bottles. Washing/sterilizing them in the dishwasher took 1-2 hours depending on the wash cycle I chose and this only takes ~8 minutes after a quick hand-wash. Another benefit is that the dishwasher caused some discoloration of the bottles and I don't get that with the sterilizer. I also used microwave sterilizer bags in the past, and while they worked faster they only held 2 bottles at a time while this holds 6. My only issue with this product is that while I appreciate the little tongs for picking up the smaller parts they are useless on the bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Anony Mouse

customer_reviews.title: How santitzed?
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product in hopes it would ease my mind on sanitation while making my life easier, but this product does neither. For some reason the now sterilized bottles take FOREVER to air dry- water sitting in bottles for that long cannot be a good thing. Plus I’m using just as much water to clean them before I put them in the machine as I would if I were just cleaning them regularly. Will be returning this time.
customer_reviews.author: amber durgom

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 6 Months
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't recommend a product that was not designed to at least outlive the manufacturer's warranty period. The unit died after 6 months of use, leaving us waiting for warranty repair that the manufacturer may or may not cover.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Beware of MOLD
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product thinking that it would be nice to sanitize my son’s bottles and pacifier. The first month I used it, it was fine. I used distilled water as it suggested. Followed all the instructions. I even empty it and wipe it clean after. However, the condensation it has around it trickles down and causes MOLD!!! DISGUSTING!!! How is this acceptable!! I lost the box or I would return this product!!! I’m so angry that it does this.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with it. I read the reviews that it gets mold, I guess it does if you don’t dry it, but every time I am done using it, I wipe off the water I have used it like 20 times already and no mold at all. It stills looks like the first time. The con, is that after sterilizing the bottles, I usually leave them to dry on the boon grass but they still have a bit water left in it. 🤷🏻‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Karmen Vazquez Reynoso

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy this is to use. We have to sterilize all bottle parts because we have well water and this makes it so easy. We use it for Dr Browns options bottles and the trays have areas built in to hold each part. We have not had any issues with scaling, but have been using bottled baby water because we have hard water.
customer_reviews.author: Tlt981

customer_reviews.title: Worth losing counter space for it
customer_reviews.text: So much easier and convenient than the Dr. Brown's bags that I used for my first pregnancy. It is big, but it is worth losing counter space for you have such a convenient item. Other brand bottles and my pump parts did well in it too!
customer_reviews.author: Derek8819

customer_reviews.title: A tired parents dream for cleaning bottles.
customer_reviews.text: A life savior. Recently gave birth to a late term preemie who could eat his small body weight in formula. However, that means we were going through bottled so quickly we couldn't keep up cleaning them & sterilizing them before he was fussin' for another bottle. It's around 8 minutes start to finish to fully santize the bottled where as booking a pot of water big enough for all the bottles would take far longer. This has saved the overly tired parents who don't want to wait over a stove for water to boil. Would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: MelxCollins

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I just think this is expensive for what it is. We bought it because a family member raves about it. When we got it we realized you’re still required to clean the bottles before putting them in it. Pointless. It doesn’t save any time. The only perk I found was that I could double sanitize new bottles before using them. I would not buy this again though.
customer_reviews.author: Sheena Rhoades

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed momma
customer_reviews.text: I got this product as a gift after I requested it on my registry. I like that it sterilizes my bottles but not even a month after using it the metal panel inside started to peel/rust. And before I get comments about the type of water that is used I have only ever used distilled water as suggested in the directions. I'm so disappointed with the quality of the product. I still use it but after 7 months I don't think it will last much longer.
customer_reviews.author: AggieGal04

customer_reviews.title: The unit does not dry out.
customer_reviews.text: This unit sterilizes bottles well, as promised. But it never dries out, and the bottles remain moist within the unit. This is a concern for mold and bacteria growth. I have to flip it over and let it dry. It takes up a lot of counter space in general, but even more when I dry it out. Sorry I bought this unit. Too much work.
customer_reviews.author: teag

customer_reviews.title: My favorite baby item!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the new bottles my daughter started using. I absolutely love how easy it is to load everything into it. It holds 6 bottles, 6 blue tubes, 6 rubber insert, 6 nipples, 6 nipple collars and 3 of the nipple covers. I actually use the sterilizer multiple times every single day. It’s super easy to use, easy to store, and I use it for baby toys that are sterilizer safe also. I will never get rid of it!!
customer_reviews.author: Bryant Deason

customer_reviews.title: Pluses and minuses
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I’m happy with the product. On the plus side, it fits lots of bottles and caps of different sizes at once. It also sterilizes quickly and well. On the minus side, it doesn’t dry the bottles and I have to wipe them down after sterilization. Also, alter a few uses, a significant amount of mineral deposits built up on the bottom. I now clean them off after every 4-5 uses.
customer_reviews.author: Oxana

customer_reviews.title: Needs drying element to machine
customer_reviews.text: Overall it’s a good product. We still use it to this day. If we had a wish for product upgrade it would be the warming/drying element. Once we run the machine to sanitize the bottles, there is always moisture inside the bottles. I wish there was a stronger warming/ drying phase to the machine. If bottles were left there for a long time, it could cause moisture problems which yields the machine ineffective
customer_reviews.author: Steven J

customer_reviews.title: Forever to dry
customer_reviews.text: I started off using the microwave steam clean bags but they only held about two bottles at a time, cleaning a days worth of bottles was taking forever so I bought this. Yes, it will steam clean a bunch of bottles and parts in one cycle but I found that bottles and parts cleaned using this took twice as long to dry. For those that are okay using towels to dry the inside of bottles and parts it won't be such a big deal but for me it was and remains frustrating and annoying
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Had it for nine months
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Had it for nine months. Bought it because I am unable to breast feed and my baby goes through a lot of bottles. Boiling was very tedious and dangerous. I can fill up the sterilizer with baby on my hip. Could not do that when I boil bottles. Yes there is some brown build up, but just clean the sterilizer after some uses. I got this initially because I was advised to use Dr Brown bottles with the vents. However. Y baby doesn't need them anymore but any bottle that we have fits nicely. Great product. 100% satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene_S

customer_reviews.title: Love it so much !!!
customer_reviews.text: This stearilizer makes my life so much easier. I’m a busy mother of two, and washing bottles at the end of the day is exhausting. And running the dishwasher every night is a waste of water. I just let the bottles soak in hot soapy water, rinse them off and put them in the sterilizer and done. So easy !!! I wish I had this for my first kid
customer_reviews.author: Michael Pratt

customer_reviews.title: Seemed like items never would dry.
customer_reviews.text: For some reason with this steriliser, my items would NEVER dry. 24 hours later it was like i just took them out of it! So i returned and got a steriliser AND a dryer!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Linneman

customer_reviews.title: Great Sterilizer
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful sterilizer. It works great for us. I didn’t know any better but I guess it doesn’t dry the bottles and lids and that is a problem for some people. For us, we use bottles constantly so once we rinse them by the time we need a bottle again they aren’t dry anyway. So if you’re looking for a sterilizer that’s dries bottles, keep looking. Other than that, we love this sterilizer. It’s VERY easy to use and sterilizes quickly. I love that I can get everything done with one use.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Sanders

customer_reviews.title: It's quick and easy to do
customer_reviews.text: This is so handy. It perfectly fits Dr. Brown's bottles (we have the 8oz version that works when you take the vent out), and it can sterilize pacifiers and sterilizer-safe toys, too. It's quick and easy to do, even when you're running on just a few hours of sleep.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: More work than needed
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this because our growing infant was going through a lot of bottles. I thought if I bought this, it would ease some of the work of bottle washing. I didn’t know you first have to clean by hand all the bottles before you can use the sanitizer, and then to add insult to the problem, I still have to hand dry all the bottles or leave them out to air dry. It just adds more work than I expected. I tried to return this, and once I did, for some reason, Amazon sent me another one and won’t refund our money. I’m hoping someone from Amazon’s Customer Service will reach out and help us.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M. Becker

customer_reviews.title: ... short trip to my aunt's place after a friend recommended it. I use a uv sterilizer at home ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a short trip to my aunt's place after a friend recommended it. I use a uv sterilizer at home so I never thought drying the bottles would take this long. It turns out the bottles never dry completely even when placed on drying racks. I am now concerned that it doesnt even sterilize properly. I would never recommend this product to anyone. I have decided to sterilize the bottles the old fashioned way, by boiling them in a large pot.
customer_reviews.author: K. Ha

customer_reviews.title: Save your money and buy one that drys too.
customer_reviews.text: All this does is sterilize. The bottles are left wet which means you either need to dry them or let them air dry - but if you let them air dry it pretty much defeats the purpose of sanitizing. Spend a few more bucks and get one that sanitizes and drys the bottles. This was a waste of money for us.
customer_reviews.author: mac

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!!
customer_reviews.text: I used the microwave bottle sterilizer prior to this but it only held 4 bottles, and I didnt run my dishwasher enough to keep up. So I bought this and it's a lifersaver!! Does 6 bottles and fits all the guts in it!! At first you think it doesnt hold much, but you start to figure it out like a puzzle and it will hold a ton!! Great for pacifiers too!! Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product was just "okay" for me
customer_reviews.text: This product was just "okay" for me. I thought the bottles would come out dry but they came out extremely wet so it made me think that this wasn't getting hot enough to sterilize everything correctly. A little bleach in extremely hot water and a wash and rise afterwards seems to do a better job.
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Total Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy when I got this but all my excitement is now over after first use. I started cycle at 8 PM yesterday and next day at 1 PM all the bottles are still wet. I can clearly see water everywhere inside. After 17 hrs. Because bottles were inside it didn't even air dried Better to use traditional method of boiling the water. This is for second child and me and my wife both are busy that's why we decided to buy this but toal waste of money I cannot even return it because in excitement I threw the box
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: DON’T BUY !!! 🚫❌  HAZARD FOR BABY
customer_reviews.text: DON’T BUY !!! 🚫❌ HAZARD FOR BABY !!! This product accumulates mold and rust un the inside heating part,no matter what you do.... all the steam will generare from a moldy part. Your baby’s bottles will be steamed with mold . All the bad reviews talk about it
customer_reviews.author: Natalia

customer_reviews.title: Does not dry
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving this 3 stars because it does work and is easy to use. My issues with it are that it doesn’t dry so it’s essentially pointless to bother sterilizing since stagnant water stays in the bottles. Also, if you use the machine daily or more often, it never had the chance to dry either unless you dry it with a towel yourself. This leaves room for mold growth. I used it a handful of times and returned it for a sterilizer with a dry cycle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! Best I’ve tried. Baby #5-I highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Must have for new parents. I’m a full time grandmother & wished I’d had this yrs ago. This is 1000x better than boiling on the stove or several other ones I’ve used in the last 3 yrs. I highly recommend this to anyone sterilizing bottles small or large.
customer_reviews.author: mary myers

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: This product should not be on the market. It started to rust after a couple of weeks and is absolutely mind blowing to me that Amazon would keep selling this item. I sanitize my newborns bottles and pacifiers and did not notice the rust till after several uses. Thus my child is ingesting whatever rust has been coming off the bottom of this product. Amazon should take this product off their website immediately. DO NOT PURCHASE THIS PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: The Cash Kid

customer_reviews.title: Great product .... but not for all Dr. Brown's bottles
customer_reviews.text: I've had the bottle sterilizer for about 2 months and it's great. It's very easy to use and to clean. I would have given it 5 stars except it doesn't work very well with the Dr. Brown's wide neck bottles. The blue reservoirs do not fit in the slots for the reservoirs. So I cannot clean 6 bottles at one time; I have to split it. They provide instructions, but it is only for the green reservoirs. Other than having to do multiple cleanings... the product works great.
customer_reviews.author: Ebony

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money. I suggest a dishwasher bottle basket
customer_reviews.text: This bottle sterilizer is huge. It didnt clean super well. We found a dish washer basket was much easier and effective. If you have space and no dish washer it may be beneficial but over all it was a pain for us so we returned it.
customer_reviews.author: MariaJ

customer_reviews.title: Great sterilizer, broke after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Love this sterilizer. Used it multiple times per day. Downside, it stopped working after only 6 months. I did follow manufacturers instructions for cleaning and only used distilled water. Will purchase again, however, as it worked so good when it was functional.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay C

customer_reviews.title: Buy it now!
customer_reviews.text: We received our first sanitizer as a baby shower gift and we can’t say enough about this product. This is our second Dr. Brown’s bottle sanitizer and only replaced the first because we had our second child and wanted to start fresh. It is a lifesaver especially with two very small kids. It transports very well when visiting relatives. We highly recommend it for new parents.
customer_reviews.author: Riley Smith

customer_reviews.title: Never dried the bottles
customer_reviews.text: This product was easy to use...but after several attempts at trying to have dry bottles, I was very unhappy with my purchase. Wet bottles grow bacteria even if the water is boiled. After leaving the bottles out overnight and till noon the next day, the bottles were still wet. Do not recommend this sterilizer! Just because it has Dr. Brown on the box doesn't mean it is a good product contrary to popular beliefs.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Grandmother

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Gifted it to my cousin and they think its the best baby shower gift. Awesome stuff. Bought some bottles to go with them too.
customer_reviews.author: datguenvy

customer_reviews.title: Easy and quick
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use and quick. 5 stars if it was able to dry the bottles as well. Otherwise great product. I throw small bottle pieces, binkies and small attachments from my pump in the accessory shelf and all is good to go.
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Worth It
customer_reviews.text: Love this sanitizer. Helps me to keep all of my Dr. Brown's bottles with their various accessories clean. The drawback is that they come out soaking wet and need to be dried if you intend to use them right away. However, if you are a bit of a germophobe like me, the sanitizer will help to ease your mind. Cycle is quick, steam is super hot. Overall, a great product. Would definitely recommend and buy again.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Doctor Brown’s Deluxe Bottle Sterilizer
customer_reviews.text: Bought it 6 weeks ago..been using fine ..till one day I lift the bottom rack..I saw the saw Yallow colored water..I dried I found the bottom stainless rusted plaque...soo worried now that our Baby bottle has need sanitized with poison rusted water..for the last 6 weeks ..we took pictures and contacted Amazon ..for a complainte and refund..Pls don’t used this product..this a dangerous poisoned water sterilizer for your Baba Bottle.I am back to the old fashion..boiling then in pot...now be contacting the Company soon .
customer_reviews.author: Samia Bradstock

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Super simple and easy to use. It's affordable and won't break the bank. I like having it to sterilize my preemies bottles, pacis, and medicine cups. I wished it held an extra bottle or two and that the top part was a little wider but I can't really complain. It does what it was designed to do.
customer_reviews.author: The Hartwells

customer_reviews.title: Great, but a tad annoying
customer_reviews.text: Would give it 5 stars but after a cycle you open it and water falls out the back behind the unit onto the counter top, it's fairly annoying that we keep a rag next to it for these annoying messes, and it's not just a drop or two its a good small puddle of water. Other than that it sanitizes and does what it should.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly. Easy to setup and runs quickly. The top section is a tight fit for all he parts from Dr. Browns bottles but it does work for 6. We just put the collar rings upside down and then the nipples inside of them. We feel funny that we bother to still sterilize in this day of modern clean water but we still do. This works for us.
customer_reviews.author: PHS Doc

customer_reviews.title: Some Improvements Needed
customer_reviews.text: I wish it dried the bottles, and kept them sanitized for 24 hours. I also wished it had an area to store the tongs and measuring cup. Other than those suggestions this is a wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: Brit

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 4 months and can’t return
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after 4 months, visible burning on the hot plate. Amazon indicates it is outside the “return window.” Money down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Son

customer_reviews.title: Job is done in a few minutes
customer_reviews.text: Great and absolutely necessary to have considering I have micro preemie twins. Easy to use, tray keeps everything organized, and does the full sterilizing job is just 8 mins. So convenient. Wish I could use regular tap water at times though. Having to use distilled water adds an expense when using regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette

customer_reviews.title: Recommend for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sterilizer primarily because the price was right compared to other products. I use it multiple times per day and clean it with vinegar at least 1x per week. The sterilizer does not dry the bottles but that isn't a big deal to me, I hand dry all the bottles after they have been sterilized. It fits all types of bottles and breast pump accessories.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite gadget!
customer_reviews.text: Love this machine! It has made my life so much easier for sterilizing pretty much anything! I hated using the microwave bags, I felt like they left a lot of room for human error. This is so simple, measure water, dump water in bottom, load racks, push start button.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: great machine.
customer_reviews.text: great machine.. if you keep it clean and disinfected once a week it wont stop working properly,.. i use it every day.. 2 o 3 times per day .. i had it for about 3 months and I love it... still working perfectly . 2018 - new review , the machine has stop working after a year. and it is very difficult to contact the seller. So far i haven't succeed with my return or exchange. make sure you understand the process of returning this item.
customer_reviews.author: Marisol

customer_reviews.title: Broke in less than 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on March 19th. it is May 13th and this thing broke about a week ago. The water no longer evaporates from the bottom and there is no steam, the bottles are barely warm. This thing is not sterilizing. What a waste of money! Threw away the box too, can't even return this crap.
customer_reviews.author: susanna

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Worked great, used it every day for over 18 months. Easy to clean and lightweight. A little bulkly but worth it if you dont like microwaves or dont have a microwave sterilizer.
customer_reviews.author: rebecca

customer_reviews.title: No drying function!!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not recommend this product. The fact that it has no drying cycle function is a major major drawback. After it sanitizes you basically have to dry everything by hand– Which kind of defeats the purpose of the sanitation process. I ended up buying a second bottle sterilizer that does have a drawing function. Trust me when you need a bottle in the middle of the night, and all of your bottle parts are covered and condensation, you’ll be glad you picked another model!
customer_reviews.author: Jacki H.

customer_reviews.title: It does the job.
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints. Does what I need it to do. I use only distilled water and it seems to get gross on the bottom every time I use it so I have to wipe and clean it out after every use. Which can be a pain when I have a hungry newborn to tend to.
customer_reviews.author: Katze

customer_reviews.title: Sterilizer
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product! It has made sterilizing bottles, pacifiers so easy! It takes just few minutes. It’s also easy to clean! The only thing I do not like is the bottles have to be taken out and placed on drying rack before putting them up. I wish it had a drying feature
customer_reviews.author: Aleshia

customer_reviews.title: One of the best purchases for a new mom
customer_reviews.text: This is super easy to use and works really well. I had a premie baby and making sure her bottles we're clean and safe was a huge priority for me. I started out using the microwave bags, but I had to do everything in 2 rounds because u couldn't fit what I needed to in 1 bag. Then I'd forget to take it out of the microwave and have to start all over. This makes it super easy to load bottles and breast pump parts and gets everything done from the day in 1 load.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Brickett

customer_reviews.title: Use it all the time!
customer_reviews.text: The only reason why I don’t give 5 stars is because it doesn’t fit the new Dr. Brown's Options+ Wide-Neck Baby Bottle. The green part is too big compared to the other models. I have the Dr. Brown options natural flow pink and now the old wide neck options, both perfect fit for the sterilizer. Still a good product I use it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Lili

customer_reviews.title: Needs a dry function
customer_reviews.text: Who’s to say if this truly sanitizes. I give it a 2 star rating though because unless you clean this out immediately you are left with a wet mess. There is not way this machine isn’t growing mold unless thoroughly hand dried after every use. The amount of moisture left inside the machine and the bottles is ridiculous
customer_reviews.author: bethany telle

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I only wish I would have bought this so much sooner. It makes the sterilizing process just so much simpler and I am all about simplifying my life. This was worth the purchase because all I have to do is put everything I want to sterilize in it then press a button and by the time I come back to it its all done. New momma's definitely make this a 'must get item'!
customer_reviews.author: Mayra

customer_reviews.title: no
customer_reviews.text: Much more expensive than a physical store! terrible! I added pure water to sterilize the bottle, and I found that the bottle was all rust! The base heating is all rust!
customer_reviews.author: Joa

customer_reviews.title: Another great product from Dr. Browns
customer_reviews.text: I use this brand for the bottles so I figured I’d buy the same for the sterilizer. I do love this because it’s very quick to sterilize and very sturdy. The only downside is the bulkiness. I wish it was a bit smaller but it does hold an incredible amount (6) bottles.
customer_reviews.author: jason kish

customer_reviews.title: Watery bottles
customer_reviews.text: We aren't sure if this product isn't working properly or if it just works very poorly. Either way it leaves a ton of condensation on the bottles after its done and I'm not sure the cool down cycle ever came on.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah A

customer_reviews.title: Works like a dream. Much needed.
customer_reviews.text: This product is great saves time it is a definite win. Much needed. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: AC Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Gets rusty
customer_reviews.text: I love dr Brown’s Products and was excited for this one but the heating plate became rusty beyond repair within a couple months had to throw it out and try a different sterilization product.
customer_reviews.author: alena

customer_reviews.title: Does not dry bottles
customer_reviews.text: This product was not what I expected as it does not try the bottles. Another problem I found was the cleaning process. In order to remove all water you have to try it after each use not very practical with a newborn. However, the sterilization process seems to be effective wish it would dry bottles
customer_reviews.author: yesenia

customer_reviews.title: Time saver!
customer_reviews.text: With twins we go through soooo many bottles and trying to sterilize them with the bags took forever and used up many bags. This sterilizer is a game changer and simplified the process!
customer_reviews.author: GiggleMom

customer_reviews.title: A most have for moms
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, couldn't live without it. Saves me a lot of time and definitely a most have for moms. I use it for my 2 month old son.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect. Great value for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this sterilizer! It fits so much and is so easy to use. I use Dr Browns bottles with my baby and this sterilizer fits the bottles perfectly! I was looking at other sterilizers for about the same price, but they weren’t nearly as large. This fits 6 bottles, all the valves and accessories with room to spare! I highly recommend this sterilizer if you’re in the market.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Easy, fast and convenient.
customer_reviews.text: This has made my life so much easier. It used to take me a long time to sterilizer the baby bottles before. Not to mention all the water waisted. Now it takes minutes and I save on water. I recommend this to any new parents, grandparents or caregiver it will make their lives easier.
customer_reviews.author: Esperanza Salcido

customer_reviews.title: TIME SAVER!
customer_reviews.text: I had a microwave sterilizer before this and that was such a pain and time consuming. This has been a game changer. So easy and efficient. Just make sure to wipe it out dry after every use.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Boiling your attachments
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think I needed this but after hearing my friend worped her attachment for her breast pump after boiling them in attempting to clean them. She spent what the machine cost to replace the damage parts. I'm so happy I have this machine
customer_reviews.author: Daniela

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality, but works okay
customer_reviews.text: This sterilizer gets the job done, but it seems to be constructed of pretty cheap plastic compared to the other sterilizers I have used. The lid also doesn't really seal all the way during a steam cycle.
customer_reviews.author: A. McNew

customer_reviews.title: just ok.. very large on kitchen counter.
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. The inside has to be dried after every use or it might start to mold . The botton to start takes a couple tries to get it to start .. it’s very bulky and just ok. As a dad of twins I recommend to skip it.
customer_reviews.author: @PWG@

customer_reviews.title: Fast and simple
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend it. It’s fast and very simple to use, although it can get very dirty from the bottom but I really loved it and can fit several of Philips Avent Bottles and lansinoh bottles. It’s a great gift for any parent that uses bottles
customer_reviews.author: AJ Ross

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use and awesome product I use it every day and I enjoy it. It doesn’t take a long time just few minutes and done.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: This is a baby shower gift. Arrive quickly. Good packaging. Product looks sturdy. Hoping my daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 4

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for all kinds of sterilizing!
customer_reviews.text: 2 years later I’m still using it almost everyday and it’s stilll doing its job- I just wish it had a built in dry mode as well
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Super fast - I really didn’t want to have to ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Super fast - I really didn’t want to have to deal with the boiling water for 10min. This thing has a high capacity so less frequent trips to the kitchen is nice too.
customer_reviews.author: PaintedLaS

customer_reviews.title: So helpful
customer_reviews.text: You can do so much with this. I mainly use it for heating up bottles and then sterilizing them. Hasn’t failed me yet.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Dr. Brown's Deluxe Bottle Sterilizer
customer_reviews.text: wonderfully easy to set up and use, although I had to leave the bottles out of dry over night
customer_reviews.author: Rena M. Mason

customer_reviews.title: Mineral deposits
customer_reviews.text: I love this product but after only a few weeks of use (with distilled water) it got chalky white deposits on the bottom. I was sent a replacement and the same thing happened. I used vinegar to de scale as per the instructions and was unable to get the deposits off.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Delivery was fine: no damage
customer_reviews.text: Seriously....we can't live without it. Delivery was fine: no damage. It accumulates mineral deposits quickly, but no worries, a quick swipe and they're gone! Do not hesitate to purchase it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: This sterilizer works like a champ! The only thing I’ve found that could use improvement is for the top bin to be a bit taller to accommodate the Dr. Browns bottle tops. If you put the top in, the top part won’t close. Other than that one minor thing, I love it! I especially like that everything has its own spot in the bottle compartment.
customer_reviews.author: Siberianhorses

customer_reviews.title: Quick sterilizing, leaves tones of moisture
customer_reviews.text: Sterilizes bottles quickly, 8 minutes. Then everything is left with moisture for hours. People recommend getting a dryer rack... Defeats purpose of sanitizing them putting on rack for hours to dry.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Downing

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: It works great for doing all of the little things you want clean and safe for the baby
customer_reviews.author: Christine Rudman

customer_reviews.title: Good Sterilizer but does not last long
customer_reviews.text: this is my 2nd sterilizer in less than 1.5 years and it stopped working again! im not happy because now i have to get another one - it does however sterilizer the bottles very well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish it dried
customer_reviews.text: Was very easy to use. Directions are very clear and easy to understand. My only complaint is that it doesn't dry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Dr. Brown's Deluxe Bottle Sterilizer
product_meta.description: Our newly redesigned Deluxe Bottle Sterilizer uses steam to sterilize six bottles at once! This convenient electric steam sterilizer system fits ALL Dr. Brown’s bottles and most other bottle brands. Easy to use and operate, this unit features electronic controls with cycle indicators plus an auto shut-off when the cycle is complete. Removable tray is designed to position bottles so steam is directed in each bottle. Built-in accessory tray holds bottle parts, nipples, and even pacifiers. Also includes tongs and measuring cup and features attractive new gray and white design. Note: This device is only compatible with North American "Type B" NEMA 5-15 standard outlet. Voltage: 110-120 Volts. (Canada and United States of America). Do not exceed the recommended amount of water. Please note that hard water may increase build up or other residue on the heating plate. If you have hard water, we recommend that you use distilled water
feature_bullets: Electronic controls with cycle indicators plus an auto shut-off when cycle is complete
Removable tray is designed to position bottles so steam is directed in each bottle
Built-in accessory tray holds bottle parts, nipples, and even pacifiers. Product dimensions: 13.3 x 12.8 x 10 inches
Also includes tongs and measuring cup. Features attractive new gray and white design.
Dr. Brown’s bottles are made of BPA-free polypropylene plastic or BPA-free borosilicate glass

specifications.Additional product features: Automatically shuts off when cycle is complete
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,932 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
